description: The thrill of being seen, the pride of display, the urge to spread it

good: I want everyone to see what {controller} has done to me
generation.notes: Headspace is thrilled by exposure, proud of being seen, eager to spread it. Three sub-threads: exhibition (being seen/showing off), recruitment (spreading to others), integration (this is just who I am now). Key imagery: public display, can't hide it, pride, confession, converting others, visible proof. The leap is from private to public - typing these is admitting you want to be seen.
